question: who is the head of the department of homeland security 2017
api_result: As of 2017, the head of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) was John F. Kelly until July 31, 2017, when he was appointed as White House Chief of Staff. After his departure, Elaine Duke served as the acting Secretary of Homeland Security until December 6, 2017, when Kirstjen Nielsen was sworn in as the official Secretary of Homeland Security.
